post:
OpenVZ+SolusVM VSwap Enabled Containers (KVM Nodes Are Shipping Soon Too!)

Location: Colorado Springs 30 min south of Denver.

Pricing on 4 plans below are inclusive of the LEB25 code.

Memory Format is as follows:  Dedicated/Burst/vSwap

128M/256M/128M 5G Disk 250G Xfer 2.00/mo (https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=16)

256M/512M/256M 10G Disk 500G Xfer 3.00/mo With Code LEB25  [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=18&promocode=LEB25)

384M/768M/384M 15G Disk 750G Xfer 4.50/mo With Code LEB25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=34&promocode=LEB25)

512M/1024M/512M 20G Disk 1TB Xfer 6.00/mo With Code LEB25 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=LEB25)

Limited Time Only Get the 768/1536b/768vswap Plan for 7.00 Use Code LEB768 [Direct Code Link!](https://www.frontrangehosting.com/wh/cart.php?a=add&pid=35&promocode=LEB768)

[Larger Plans Available](http://www.frontrangehosting.com/vps.php) All plans are 25% off with LEB25 and you can upgrade anytime and keep your discount!

Features
SSD Accelerated Nodes
OpenVZ with Ksplice - no reboots for kernel security updates
Native IPv6
Fast 24 Core Intel Xeon Nodes
4 vCPU Default
Redundant Network, Power, and HVAC



Denver TestIP 64.111.29.139 (http://testden.frontrangehosting.com/test10m.dat)


FREE DNS Management - with DNS servers in 4 geographically diverse locations on 4 different network providers (No need for extra ip's or other VPS's for your DNS, it's managed through our client portal!)

EV SSL Protected Shopping Cart, Accept Credit Cards, Paypal, and 2 Checkout
